sub_title: Specialty coffee professional | Unifying coffee trading best practices | Leveraging digital coffee education
summary:
My goal is to empower coffee producer organizations to enter specialty markets and build meaningful relationships with importers and roasters. I am the founder and owner of Vuna Origin Consulting, a boutique green coffee consulting company that offers business solutions to the coffee market disparity. 

I am also the founder of Vuna Coffee School, the first digital coffee education platform for coffee professionals at origin that seeks to empower, connect and build a community of best coffee trading practices.

treasury_media.title: 10 Minutes with Sara Morrocchi
treasury_media.description: Meet Sara Morrocchi. From starting off in Kenya as a development worker, to running a green coffee procurement team across Latin America and East Africa, Sara Morrocchi is a coffee veteran that reinvents herself by launching Vuna Origin Consulting, a boutique green coffee consulting company that supports companies and producer organizations at origin enter and prosper in specialty markets.

treasury_media.title: Sara Morrocchi on the Impact of Market Consolidation in Specialty Coffee
treasury_media.description: An informative insights on how big coffee players are changing the landscape of the specialty coffee sector and how companies and producer organizations an origin can evolve in a fast-changing environment.

treasury_media.title: Behind the scenes: building the digital tools for coffee
treasury_media.description: In this session of the Digital Coffee Future series, Jean Orlowski (ECropOrigin), Dominik Mucklow (Cropster) and Oscar Magro (Sustainable Harvest) walk us through their experience of building digital solutions for coffee. This is an opportunity to learn more about the processes of software development. The session is moderated by Sara Morrocchi, Vuna Origin Consulting.

treasury_media.title: Sara Morrocchi, Founder, VUNA Origin Consulting: Brand, Story, and Relationship to Create Value
treasury_media.description: The World Intellectual Property Association's (WIPO) first Asia/Pacific virtual conference dedicated to coffee production. Some 280 participants from around the world joined to learn on issues related to intellectual property and coffee. In her lecture, Sara Morrocchi takes a deep dive into the power of storytelling and branding to connect with specialty markets and build lasting relationships with clients.

treasury_media.title: Sara Morrocchi | Preserving the Coffee Supply Chain Amid Big Money Investment
treasury_media.description: Big investors coming into specialty coffee has many potential upsides, but it can also include changing payment structures, which can lead to increased price exposure for importers and growers. Sara Morrocchi, an expert in supply chain strategies and development work, explains the dimensions of the problem at #RecoDublin.

treasury_media.title: Articolo Notiziario torreffattori
treasury_media.description: An article about Vuna Origin Consulting in a famous Italian on-line coffee magazine!

profile_positions.description:
Vuna is a coffee consulting company that is passionate about providing ad-hoc solutions to build and scale agricultural value chains. We love working in  * cost of production & living income *financial literacy & price risk management *value chain analysis and scale *procurement strategies *sales & marketing

We work with international organizations on several projects in Central America, Asia and Africa. Our clients include USAID, GIZ, Asian Development Bank (ADB), Coffee Quality Institute, OikoCredit, Brot fur Die Welt, among other privately owned companies.
profile_positions.title: Founder & Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description:
Clients include: Keurig Green Mountain, Coffee Bean International, Peet’s Coffee, Allegro/WholeFoods, Stumptown Coffee Roasters, Blue Bottle Coffee among others

Strategic Planning & Business Development
■ Lead company-wise strategic planning to identify framework, manage cost efficiencies, and increase annual profitability by 12%
■ Oversee the restructuring of business unit by creating and direct-managing a new sourcing & procurement department
■ Create, implement, and promote strategic planning to drive operational excellence and increase on-time delivery of green coffee to clients by 25%

Team Leadership:
■ Provide leadership to a multinational team of 12 sourcing & quality control professionals in US, Mexico, Nicaragua, Colombia, Peru and Tanzania
■ Foster a culture of innovation and creativity by applying quantifiable results to make business decisions
■ Partner with the sales and costumer service team to increase our green coffee portfolio to meet clients needs 
■ Collaborate with the marketing  team to develop and launch a web-based supplier information portal to increase visibility and transparency of the supply chain.

Procurement & Sourcing:
■ Accelerate  green coffee purchases by 10% in 15 months
■ Launch and supervise innovative sourcing & purchasing strategy of green coffee for 16 countries with over 100 suppliers
■ Found procurement department with 4 buyers in Mexico, Central and South America and East Africa
■ Deliver the growth of award winning (90+ scores) coffees portfolio by 45%,

Sustainability:
■ Provide guidance on implementing new supplier system to streamline purchase processes by 30 % in 15 months
■ Drive the implementation of responsible sourcing guidelines for non-certified green coffee
■ Create green coffee supplier scorecard to standardize QA process, on-time logistics and certification compliance

Logistics & Operational Excellence:
■ Optimize supplier on-time delivery by 25% in 13 months, with incremental saving of $75,000
profile_positions.title: Global Supply Chain Director

profile_positions.description:
Founded and Supervised a team of 4 multinational staff to build a long term, sustainable and high quality driven supply chain in East Africa

Strategic Planning & Development:
■ Founded a new office in Tanzania and supervised operations for the East African region (Tanzania, Rwanda, Ethiopia, Malawi)
■ Managed a budget over $1m to design and execute green coffee supply chain. Successfully delivered increasing market access & export by 50%,  and product quality by 30%

Procurement & Sourcing:
■ Expanded green coffee purchases by 50%+ for a total of 500,000lb across four countries
■ Successfully coordinated the implementation of a logistics and export department for two key East African suppliers

Green Coffee Quality Control:
■ Supervised the construction project of coffee cherry processing stations for over 10 green coffee suppliers at a budget of $750,000
■ Established quality control and cupping lab for total budget of  $50,000
■ Implemented and refined quality performance indicators to delivery higher green coffee quality
profile_positions.title: Program Manager, East Africa

profile_positions.description:
Drive the birth and establishment of a brand new country office in Kenya to lead social programs in the infamous Nairobi informal settlements

Leader of a team of 4 local and international grassroots and community project leaders

■ Led grassroots campaigns on civil liberties, freely chosen employment and fair wages
■ Developed outreach strategies within the urban informal settlements (slums) of Kibera, Korogocho and Mathare valley
■ Supervised and executed fundraising campaigns for private and institutional donors
■ Managed an operational budget of  $250,000
■ Analyzed the latest fashion trends at major market events and provided trendsetting reports to clients for future buying
profile_positions.title: Kenya Country Coordinator
